name: Operation Greenwashing
description: Federal Police investigation into fraudulent carbon credit schemes in the Amazon region
detection_signals: Multiple claims for overlapping forest areas
Baseline inflation of 200-400% above realistic levels
No evidence of community consultation or benefit sharing
lessons_learned: REDD+ projects require independent satellite verification
Community land rights must be verified before credit issuance
Cross-registry checks essential for Amazon region
Compression-based detection would have flagged 95% of claims
source: Brazilian Federal Police Operation Greenwashing Investigation 2024
